Job Title: Full-Time Resource Chef

Location: Pittsburgh, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Full-Time Resource Chef

Job Reference Number: 18625

Employment Type: Full-Time, OnsiteSegment: Healthcare

Brand: Cura-Hospitality

State: Pennsylvania (US-PA)

Why work for Cura Hospitality? 

Come join our amazing team and enjoy:

No late Night Shifts!Weekly Pay!Free meals!Work/Life Balance!Competitive Benefits Package!Tuition Reimbursement!Employee Referral Bonus!401K & Company Match!

Elior North America is a family of distinct hospitality companies with more than 50 years of industry experience and 15,000 team members united in our passion for food, service, and excellence. We share an appetite for growth which drives all of us to continually reimagine our customers’ experience.

The Role at a glance:

We are looking to add an experienced, motivated Full-Time Resource Chef to our Healthcare team in Pittsburgh, PA. As a Resource Chef, you will have the opportunity to supervise and participate in the preparation of meals for various locations as assigned. Cura Hospitality has a wonderful partnership with Allegheny Health Network and the Resource Chef will travel between 7 locations in and around the Pittsburgh area. As a Resource Chef, you must have a reliable form of transportation. The locations covered by this position are Allegheny General Hospital, Forbes Hospital, Jefferson Hospital, West Penn Hospital, Wexford Hospital, Canonsburg, and Allegheny Valley. Mileage reimbursement provided for commutes over 30 miles. Transportation cannot be covered by Uber and Lift services, or a bus route. #indeedelior #JC

What you'll be doing:

Planning, organizing, and supervising culinary operations of retail and catering services. Planning menus based on various factors, such as market trends, customer preferences, and nutritional considerations. Conferring with district managers or other departments regarding daily aspects of dining service. Directing and coordinating the work of kitchen staff. Other tasks as assigned. 

What we're looking for:

Must-haves:

Certification by a recognized culinary institution or an equivalent combination of education and experience. Experience in batch and bulk cooking. Ability to travel up to 75% of the time. At least three years’ experience in culinary management. Strong kitchen leadership and communication skills. Intermediate tech skill - Must be able to use Outlook, Excel, & Online ordering systems. 

Nice-to-haves:

At least one years’ experience in a similar role. Supervisory experience preferred. Culinary experience in the healthcare industry a plus!

Where you'll be working:

Allegheny Health Network and the surrounding locations near Pittsburgh, PA

The locations covered by this position are Allegheny General Hospital, Forbes Hospital, Jefferson Hospital, West Penn Hospital, Wexford Hospital, Canonsburg, and Allegheny Valley.*

Full-Time Benefits:

Medical DentalVisionVoluntary UNUM offering for Accident, Critical Illness and Hospital IndemnityDiscount ProgramCommuter BenefitsEAP401kSick TimeHoliday Pay (9 paid holidays)Tuition ReimbursementPaid Time Off 

Compensation: 

$23.00 - $26.00 per hour DOE

About Cura:

Cura serves hospitals, senior living centers, and other long-term care facilities. We guarantee compassionate service and healthy, delicious meals to ensure that quality of life never diminishes.

About Elior North America:

Elior North America is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. We are committed to diversity and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and abilities. We take pride in supporting the development of our employees and their skills at all levels and in fostering an environment of growth.

At Elior North America, we are committed to offering growth and advancement opportunities for all of our employees. The valuable skills and experience you’ve gained with Elior will propel you further in your career, whether with our corporate office or one of our brand segments.

Disclaimer: This job description can be revised by management as needed.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
